ips_n_tortuga.name: IPS‑N Tortuga
ips_n_tortuga.special: Your frame counts as hard cover. Once per encounter, as a reaction, you can hunker down to gain resistance to damage until your next turn.

horus_goblin.name: HORUS Goblin
horus_goblin.special: Symbiosis – As a action, attach to a willing allied mech (larger than yours) to occupy their space. While attached, you gain hard cover but share conditions with host. Host may use your Fittings, Saves, and Tech Attack. You take actions during host's turn instead of your own. Lasts until you detach (free action) or either mech is Stunned.

cns_qilin.name: CNS Qilin
cns_qilin.special: Benevolent Resonance – Allies within 3 gain +1 AC. 1/round you may redirect a hostile's reaction or overwatch attack to yourself.

cns_baihu.name: CNS Baihu
cns_baihu.special: Triumphant Roar – When you destroy or critically damage a target, all hostiles within 2 must save vs Mental or become Shaken (‑2 on attacks) for 1 round; you repair 4 HP.

cns_zhuque.name: CNS Zhuque
cns_zhuque.special: Gravity Stabilizers – Heavy/Loading weapons you fire ignore Inaccurate and automatically Brace (no action). If you move more than 2, the benefit is lost until your next turn.

dm_chevalier.name: DM Chevalier
dm_chevalier.special: Cavalry Charge – 1/round, if you move 3+ before making a melee attack, gain +2 Accuracy and +4 damage on that attack.

dm_casemate.name: DM Casemate
dm_casemate.special: Fortified Bastion – Counts as hard cover for adjacent allies. 1/scene you may Brace as a free action; until your next turn all ranged damage to you is halved.

dm_fusilier.name: DM Fusilier
dm_fusilier.special: Riposte – Once/round, when a melee attack misses you, make a free Sidearm or Melee attack against the attacker.

nf_cid.name: NF Cid
nf_cid.special: Flux‑Veil – After Boosting you become Invisible and ignore engagement until end of turn.

nf_cortes.name: NF Cortes
nf_cortes.special: Cibernetic Regen – 1/scene Quick—patch nanites, repairing 6 HP and clearing Impaired/Slowed.

nf_tercio.name: NF Tercio
nf_tercio.special: Phalanx Protocol – Adjacent allies gain hard cover. While you haven't moved this turn, ranged damage against you is halved.

ssc_swallowtail.name: SSC Swallowtail
ssc_swallowtail.special: Integrated Cloak – At the end of its turn, the Swallowtail becomes Invisible if it hasn’t moved that turn. This lasts until it moves or takes a reaction, or until the start of its next turn.

ssc_deaths_head.name: SSC Death's Head
ssc_deaths_head.special: Mark for Death – As an action, mark a target. When you score a hit by 10 or more against the marked target, deal additional damage equal to d12 × your weapon's hard points.
